title: BIT_LOAD_DW Function
description:
BIT_LOAD_DW copies the VAL bit at the input to the bit in position N in
DWORD IN. The least signifcant bit B0 is described by the position 0.
name: BIT_LOAD_DW

input.name: IN
input.description: The input DWORD value to be manipulated.

input.name: VAL
input.description: A boolean flag that determines whether to set (TRUE) or clear (FALSE) a bit in the input DWORD.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the bit in the DWORD to be manipulated, where 0 is the least significant bit.

output.name: BIT_LOAD_DW
output.description: The resulting DWORD after the bit manipulation operation has been applied.

return_value.description: Returns the modified DWORD after adjusting the specified bit according to the VAL parameter.
